txt.en: Talk to Argel at the mine

'So Gwilum sent you to help? That is good, for we need many strong arms.

'Bugan have infested our mine, and we were fortunate to escape with as few casualties as we did. If you wish to help, Duvodiad, enter the mine and kill the bugan.

'Will you do this? Destroy the bugan and their chieftain! If we cannot work the mine, I fear the Brenin will punish our families.'
'I am impressed, Duvodiad. It takes great courage to face those vile creatures.\n\n'Soon, we will be able to return to the mine, and our families will remain safe. My thanks to you.'
The Barnavon Mine has been infested by bugan, who have driven forth the Boar-clan miners.
Bugan can be found within the Barnavon Mine.\n\nArgel has asked you to enter the Barnavon Mine and defeat many of the bugan which drove them out.
Argel is at the camp outside the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should return to Argel with news of your deeds.
